title: Add PDF translator with language conversion and alignment

requirements.summary: Implement PDF translator feature that converts PDF documents from one language to another language while preserving the original document layout and alignment
acceptanceCriteria: User can upload a PDF file for translation
User can select source and target languages from a dropdown or language picker
Translation preserves the original PDF layout, formatting, and alignment
Translated text maintains the same positioning as the original text
System generates a new translated PDF file that can be downloaded

file_operations.description: Create PDF translator page component with file upload interface using FileUploader component, source and target language selection dropdowns, translation status display, and download functionality for the translated PDF. Include disclaimer message about image text translation limitations. Use the blob-storage component to handle PDF file uploads and downloads via ExternalBlob class. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add route configuration for /pdf-translator path pointing to the PdfTranslator page component within the TanStack Router setup
Add 'PDF Translator' navigation link to the main navigation menu alongside existing PDF tool links, routing to /pdf-translator

requirements.summary: Display a prominent disclaimer message 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' on the PDF translator page to inform users about translation limitations
acceptanceCriteria: Disclaimer text 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' is clearly visible on the PDF translator page
Disclaimer appears before or during the translation process
Disclaimer uses appropriate styling to draw user attention (e.g., info banner or warning message)

file_operations.description: Add prominent disclaimer banner with text 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' positioned above or near the file upload area. Style the disclaimer using an info or warning banner component with appropriate visual emphasis to draw user attention

requirements.summary: Add PDF Translator navigation item to the homepage and main navigation menu alongside existing PDF tools
acceptanceCriteria: PDF Translator tool card appears on the homepage grid with appropriate icon and description
Navigation menu includes PDF Translator link
Clicking the tool card or navigation link routes to the PDF translator page

file_operations.description: Add ToolCard component for PDF Translator to the homepage grid with icon referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/translate-icon.dim_128x128.png, title 'PDF Translator', description about converting PDFs between languages, and navigation to /pdf-translator route
Ensure PDF Translator navigation link is added to the responsive navigation menu, maintaining consistency with existing PDF tool navigation items

requirements.summary: Create a new PDF Translator page component with file upload interface, language selection controls, translation preview, and download functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes FileUploader component for PDF upload
Page provides source and target language selection dropdowns
Page displays the disclaimer about image text translation
Page shows translation progress or status
Page provides download button for the translated PDF

file_operations.description: Ensure the PDF Translator page integrates FileUploader for PDF uploads, includes source and target language selection dropdowns with common languages (e.g., English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese), displays translation progress/status during processing, shows the disclaimer banner, and provides a download button for the translated PDF file once translation completes. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob class for file handling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
